title: ZITY 5 Pack Mens Polo Shirt Short Sleeve Sports Golf Tennis T-Shirt Moisture-Wicking Summer Shirts
description: QUALITY MATERIAL: This men’s polo shirts short sleeve made from Polyester Spandex, offering lightweight, moisture wicking, soft hand-feel, four way stretch, keep you cool and breathable

COLOR AND SIZE: Our mens golf polo short sleeve based on US regular fit: M, L, XL, XXL, 3XL and multiple colors for choice, allowing for great mobility in any directions and making you have different look everyday
STYLISH FEATURE: Our mens casual shirts, button placket and simple look that make this golf polo shirt a go-to for the office or the vacation

OCCASION: This mens shirts casual is easy to match for a daily look, can be a business casual shirt,also perfect for sport, golf, tennis and other outdoor activities. Great gift for husband, friends or boyfriends
WASH TIP: Machine wash, anti-fading and anti-pilling, do not bleach
